title: Project, 1915–25
medium: Pencil, yellow watercolor, white, gray paper
description: Ribbons with a triangular end are pulled through a clasp and then hang downwards supporting rings; to the rings are fastened, B: a pierced half ovoid in which the two persons as before (in A)  kneel. Bordering lines laterally and on top. Trimmed at the bottom, cutting away half of the signature and a blue stamp, beginning with a T.

tombstone.epitaph: Project, 1915–25.Pencil, yellow watercolor, white, gray paper. 1939-84-34-b.
